title: Death of a Showjumper review – the investigators in this bleak true-crime drama restore your faith in humanity
summary: The gripping three-part series centers on the death of a young equestrian, highlighting the relentless pursuit of justice by two individuals. title: Roofman review – Channing Tatum and Kirsten Dunst lift fact-based crime caper
summary: In Derek Cianfrance's comedy-drama, two leading stars showcase their talents as they navigate a story centered on a deceitful prison escapee. The film delivers moments of effectiveness while exploring themes of deception and escape. Overall, it offers a blend of humor and drama through its compelling performances.
